content:
Folks, using the ImageStudy resource as a base, I made a very rough cut of a resource for Genomic Study in this branch via a copy/replace from ImagingStudy:

https://build.fhir.org/branches/genomicStudyResource/genomicstudy.html

Lots of work left to do (including removal of the legacy ImagingStudy prose), but it currently gets green lights on the build. Enjoy!

The GenomicStudy has been updated with the current resource content and proposed documentation, would be good for everyone to review:
https://build.fhir.org/branches/genomicStudyResource/genomicstudy.html
This is great. We started this work on https://github.com/rrfreimuth/HL7-CG-Models. It is great to see it as a branch on FHIR build. How we can continue updating it? what is the GitHub repo for this?

The branch is here:
https://github.com/HL7/fhir/tree/genomicStudyResource

Doing the FHIR core build is pretty different and has lots of dependencies. So if anyone has suggestions for changes, it might need to come through via a Zulip chat
